message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I know it's worth a lot to you, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $98. It's a fair price, considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen.
